title: Beat the Heat!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Ugh~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oh, you’re melting, Mia-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>It’s because it’s way too hot out~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Here, put this on then. It’s a straw hat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I have a baseball cap in my...... Oh, this actually feels cool......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>The brim is wide, so it shades you better. Put this on too. It’s a neck towel.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>This makes me look like a weirdo...... Not bad, though......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I have these too! Ramune~! Let’s crack some open and drink.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wow! That’s so cool!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>There are lots of fun things to do because of the heat. Let’s go to the beach after drinking this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
